{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3251898,"name":"Kavish Kondap","username":"Kavish_Kondap","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/k/e19adc/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-11-11T00:30:32.499Z","cooked":"

image1414×2000 271 KB

It’s that time of year again! Team 2485 The W.A.R. Lords proudly presents our annual CADathon…Introducing, SPLASHDOWN, the water game you’ve all been waiting for! Participants will have two weeks to design a robot or mechanism made to take on the aquatic arcade of this mock FRC game.

  • Anyone can participate in the CADathon.
  • Kickoff starts at 6:30 PM PST on Thursday, November 16th to 11:59 PM PST on Thursday, November 30th.
  • The best submissions will receive awards and have the chance to win various prizes!
  • To learn more, join our CADathon Discord server where we host all of our CADathons

Team 2485 CADathon Discord: 2485 CADathon
